sentence.Network_en: The heterozygote Y / y may be distinguished by the nectary color.
sentence.Network_cn: 用蜜腺颜色就可以确定为异质结合的(Y/y).

sentence.Network_en: The nectary originates from the several outer layer cells of base of carpel primordia.
sentence.Network_cn: 蜜腺起源于心皮原基基部外侧的几层细胞.

sentence.Network_en: Ultrastructure on dictyosome and its vesicle secretion during the development of floral nectary Arabidopsis thaliana L.
sentence.Network_cn: 花蜜腺发育过程中蜜腺细胞内高尔基体的活动进行了观察,并且对高尔基体分泌泡的分泌途径进行了探讨.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...有些植物的花柱很短甚至没有；子房位于雌蕊基部，比较膨大，内生胚珠（ovule），受精后胚珠形成种子，子房基部常着生一些蜜腺（nectary），以吸引昆虫、鸟类或其他动物为其传粉，子房形成果实。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from modern Latin nectarium, from nectar (see nectar)

means.word_mean: 1. a gland (often a protuberance or depression) that secretes nectar
